channel.title: Home on My Thought Garden
channel.description: Recent content in Home on My Thought Garden

item.title: The Activation of a Thought Garden
item.description: For years, I’ve thought about starting a journal. I wanted a place to put everything—thoughts, beliefs, feelings, dreams, and even regrets—into a single archive. Part of it was for me, a way to look back and understand why I made the decisions I did. But part of it was for my children, so that one day they might look back and see what their father was thinking during this pivotal time in history.

item.title: Markdown Syntax Guide
item.description:
For a quick cheatsheet, check out https://simplemde.com/markdown-guide.

This article offers a sample of basic Markdown syntax that can be used in Hugo content files, also it shows whether basic HTML elements are decorated with CSS in a Hugo theme.
